sn_fcms_intg_service_map.envelope: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:urn="urn:sap-com:document:sap:soap:functions:mc-style"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <urn:_-now_-spendAssetDetails> <!--Optional:--> <AssetsKey> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <item> <AssetNumber>${item.AssetNumber}</AssetNumber> <AssetSysid>{item.AssetSysid}</AssetSysid> <LegalEntity>${item.LegalEntity}</LegalEntity> </item> </AssetsKey> <!--Optional:--> <DepreciationArea> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <item> <Sign>I</Sign> <Option>EQ</Option> <Low>1</Low> <High>?</High> </item> </DepreciationArea> <!--Optional:--> <Source>${_-now_-spendAssetDetails.Source}</Source> </urn:_-now_-spendAssetDetails> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
sn_fcms_intg_service_map.name: Fetch Fixed Asset Details
